Card Cognition

Welcome to Card Cognition, your go-to source for optimizing your Magic decks using AI tools. Our website is designed to help you create the best possible Magic deck to give you the winning edge in your games.

About Us

At Card Cognition, we are passionate about Magic: The Gathering and helping players succeed. Our team of experts has developed AI tools to analyze your deck and provide you with recommendations on how to make it more competitive.

Decks

Check out our collection of optimized Magic decks. You can browse through different formats and archetypes to find the perfect deck for your play style.

  • Modern
  • Legacy
  • Commander
